name: Politics Matters
goal: Politics Matters monitors the political situation and negotiations at European level developing and strengthening outreach and advocacy activities.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Information Society, Public Health, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Politics Matters monitors and engages on the following key EU policy themes: Security & Defence; Civil Protection mechanism; Health & Food policies in general and Health Security in particular; Disruptive Innovation Technologies; Mobility & Transport; Energy Efficiency; Aviation and EASA Regulation.
